rukus.text: 15|62|lus-i naega alji moshaneun dangsindeul-eun nugu-inyo lago malhani
15|63|ulineun sajalosseo baegseongdeul-i uisimhaneun geos-eul wanseonghagoja dangsin kke wassnaida
15|64|ulineun jinlilo dangsinkke ileu leoss-eumae uliga malham-i jinlila
15|65|geuleomeulo dangsin gajoggwa hamkke bamjung-e tteonala geuligo geudeul dwileul ttaleudoe neohui gaunde eoneu nugudo dwidol-aboji malla neohuiga myeonglyeongbad-eungeugos-eulo tteonala
15|66|geuligo achim-i doel ttae joeindeulmoduege eunhyega danjeoldoelilaneun sosig-eul geuege jeonhayeossdeoni
15|67|geu dosiui baegseongdeul-i gippeoha myeo seodulleo odeola
15|68|ittae los-i malhagil ibundeul-eun naui sonnimdeul-ini na-ege yogdoeji anhge hayeo jusigo
15|69|hananim-eul gyeong-oehayeo naleul bu kkeuleobge hajimasoseo lago malhani
15|70|geudeul-i malhagil uliga dangsin kke jeomada-ege malhaneun geos-eul geumha ji anihayeossso
15|71|los-i malhagil neohuiga wonhanda myeon gyeolhonhal naui ttaldeul-i issnola
15|72|maengsehageondae sillo geudeul-eun geudeul-ui bulsin-e dochwidoeeo banghwanghago issnola
15|74|geuleohgehayeo hananim-eun geu dosileul dwieop-eossgo yeol-e dalgueojin dol bileul geudeul-ege naelyeoss-euni
15|75|sillo geu an-eneun ihaehaneun jadeul-eul wihan yejeung-eulo
15|76|geu dosineun ajig jiwojiji anhneun gil-wie issnola
15|77|sillo geuan-eneun midneun jadeul-eul wihan yejeungdo iss-eudoe
15|79|geulaeseo hananim-i geudeul-ege beol-eul naelimae geu du go-eul-i myeolmang han heunjeog-i ajigdo gil-wie issdeola
